definition: day by day/more and more/increasingly/more and more with each passing day
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: The link is the growing strain on the world"s sole superpower. America is locked into a draining and demoralising war."
sentences.chinese: 这个联系就是全球唯一超级大国面临的压力日益增加。

sentences.english: Under these conditions, ethnic family patterns were slowly broken down by an increasingly urbanized, industrialized environment.
sentences.chinese: 工业化的日益发展，种族家庭的模式缓慢地解体。

sentences.english: She says she is glad to see that the ukulele is gaining popularity.
sentences.chinese: 她说，她很高兴地看到，四弦琴是日益普及。

sentences.english: Nowadays, the phenomenon of telephone harassment is becoming more and more pervasive.
sentences.chinese: 当前骚扰电话问题日益普遍。

sentences.english: Tourism is growing source of income for people in the region.
sentences.chinese: 旅游事业是这个区域里日益增长的收入来源。

sentences.english: Our country young people computer-related crime phenomenon is day by day prominent.
sentences.chinese: 我国的青少年计算机犯罪现象日益突出。

sentences.english: The role of city and city-region in the age of globalization is becoming increasingly important.
sentences.chinese: 在全球化时代，城市和城市地区的重要性日益提升。

sentences.english: Some countries have an ever-increasing proportion of population who are aged 15 and younger.
sentences.chinese: 有些国家已经日益增加的人口比例是十五岁年轻。

sentences.english: The media industry is increasingly hoping it stays that way.
sentences.chinese: 传媒业正日益盼望保持这一势头。

sentences.english: And rising bills are enough to make even the most bath-fond switch to showers.
sentences.chinese: 日益增加的水电费甚至足以令最爱缸浴的人改为淋浴。

sentences.english: The dietotherapy for the treatment of hypertension has been paid attention increasingly in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 近年来，高血压病的饮食疗法日益受到重视。

sentences.english: Regus also supports the growing trend of mobile and home working.
sentences.chinese: 雷格斯亦支援日益受欢迎的流动办公及在家办公人士。

sentences.english: So what does the size of the Internet have to do with NAT?
sentences.chinese: 那么面对日益庞大的因特网，NAT该做什么呢？

sentences.english: The contradiction between flood control and profit is getting increasingly serious as industry and agriculture develop.
sentences.chinese: 随着工农业的发展，水库防洪与兴利矛盾日益突出。

sentences.english: Indeed, youth activism around environmental issues is growing in India.
sentences.chinese: 确实，印度应对环保问题的青年运动日益高涨。

sentences.english: With more and more frequent international contact, more and more Chinese are learning English.
sentences.chinese: 随着国际交往日益频繁，中国人学外语的也日渐增多。

definition: (increasing) day by day/(more critical) with every passing day/gradually
to progress (or increase, change etc) day by day/more (or better etc) with each passing day
to increase steadily/to grow with each passing day
increasingly/more and more/ever more/all the more
more critical with every passing day
to intensify/to sharpen/to accelerate/to aggravate/to exacerbate/to embitter
